## âœ… Checklist

### Code Quality
- [ ] My code follows the project's style guidelines
- [ ] I have performed a self-review of my own code
- [ ] I have commented my code, particularly in hard-to-understand areas
- [ ] I have made corresponding changes to the documentation
- [ ] My changes generate no new warnings
- [ ] I have added tests that prove my fix is effective or that my feature works
- [ ] New and existing unit tests pass locally with my changes
- [ ] Any dependent changes have been merged and published

### Testing & Quality
- [ ] All automated tests pass
- [ ] Code coverage is at least 90% for new code
- [ ] I have tested on multiple Windows versions (if applicable)
- [ ] I have tested with different image formats (if applicable)
- [ ] No performance regression has been introduced
- [ ] Memory leaks have been checked

### Documentation
- [ ] User documentation has been updated (if needed)
- [ ] API documentation has been updated (if needed)
- [ ] CHANGELOG.md has been updated
- [ ] Code comments are clear and helpful
- [ ] XML documentation is complete for public APIs

### Security
- [ ] Security implications have been considered
- [ ] No sensitive information is exposed
- [ ] Input validation is implemented
- [ ] No new security warnings from static analysis

### Backend Changes (if applicable)
- [ ] Database migrations are included (if needed)
- [ ] API versioning is respected
- [ ] Error handling is comprehensive
- [ ] Logging is appropriate

### Frontend Changes (if applicable)
- [ ] UI is responsive and accessible
- [ ] No console errors or warnings
- [ ] Browser compatibility checked
- [ ] TypeScript types are correct

### PowerShell Changes (if applicable)
- [ ] PSScriptAnalyzer passes
- [ ] Pester tests are included
- [ ] Comment-based help is complete
- [ ] Parameter validation is implemented
